column4: spent yesterday sifting through 1k lines of code with valgrind, trying to find a memory bug...only to discover this morning, that it was a good old case of writing "==" instead of "=" :<
or in other words, if you do ctrl+alt=f1, does it make a beep in the real terminal?
old case of "if you have a hammer everything starts looking like a nail"? :>
that should be in the revised edition of the Art of War...
